549760.name: Evolution VR
549760.description:
Dive into an alien world, and evolve a creature of your design to be the top of the food chain. Precisely guide your creature to attack smaller prey and avoid predators with motion controls. Fully customize your creature’s body parts and abilities, unlocking more as you grow. Explore beautiful and dangerous worlds with larger predators around every corner. Become the most fearsome creature on the planet!

GAME FEATURES


  • Customize your character
  • Explore immersive underwater worlds
  • Evolve and grow by eating other creatures
  • Room-scale VR experience
  • Low-poly art style
  • Full motion controller support
